description: Load and filter documents from a local or remote Git repository. Use a local repo path or clone from a remote URL.

inputs.name: repo_source
inputs.info: Select whether to use a local repo path or clone from a remote URL.

inputs.name: repo_path
inputs.info: The local path to the existing Git repository (used if 'Local' is selected).

inputs.name: clone_url
inputs.info: The URL of the Git repository to clone (used if 'Clone' is selected).

inputs.name: branch
inputs.info: The branch to load files from. Defaults to 'main'.

inputs.name: file_filter
inputs.info:
Patterns to filter files. For example:
Include only .py files: '*.py'
Exclude .py files: '!*.py'
Multiple patterns can be separated by commas.

inputs.name: content_filter
inputs.info: A regex pattern to filter files based on their content.
